paragraphs: I am a Product Owner with 3+ years of experience working at the intersection of business, technology, and user needs. I specialize in translating complex requirements into clear backlogs, prioritizing what matters, and enabling teams to deliver predictable outcomes in multi-stakeholder environments.

I hold a Master's degree in Engineering Management with a specialization in Product Management, and I'm certified as a Certified Scrum Product Owner (CSPO), IBM AI Product Manager, and Unilever Digital Marketing Analyst. I enjoy leveraging structured product thinking and data to drive informed decisions and measurable impact.
